projects.title: Polyscope
projects.description: Contributed to enhancing the official university newspaper website, Le Polyscope, by designing and implementing new features using React and Firebase. Collaborated with a team to improve the user experience through responsive interfaces built with Material-UI. Gained hands-on experience in Agile development, sprint planning, and GitLab version control.

about_me: I'm a software engineering student passionate about building user-centered applications that combine clean design with scalable engineering for exceptional user experiences. I thrive at the intersection of creativity and technology, solving problems and bringing innovative ideas to life.

Currently, I’m working on full-stack development, cybersecurity, and machine learning projects, including a task manager app to boost productivity and a pentesting tool for automating website vulnerability assessments. These projects enhance my skills in creating robust software while addressing real-world challenges.

My journey includes contributing to challenging GitHub repositories and collaborating on a cybersecurity-focused startup, building a strong foundation in software design, problem-solving, and teamwork. Beyond coding, I’m an avid Brazilian jiu-jitsu practitioner, a fitness enthusiast, and a runner, always exploring creative hobbies and planning my next big idea.
